name: Splash Moist Towel Glamourous
description: With its unmistakable fragrance of sophistication, this product helps you to exude charm and poise while inviting admiration. This is an antiseptic and hygienic face and hand wipe which will help you to be safe through cleanliness and hygiene. This is a Sri Lankan product manufactured to suite our tropical climatic conditions. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
